=== About Me ===

I'm currently a student in Melbourne, Australia who's interested in open source software and operating systems. 

==== Contributions ====

* I've held Ubuntu UserDays sessions over the past 3 cycles.
** Natty cycle I held a session titled <nowiki>[[http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/2011/09/25/%23ubuntu-classroom.html#t00:00|"Launchpad Basics"]]</nowiki>
** Oneiric cycle I held a session titled <nowiki>[[http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/2012/01/15/%23ubuntu-classroom.html#t01:00|"How to Get Involved with the Community"]]</nowiki>
** for the Precise cycle I held a session titled <nowiki>[[http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/2012/06/24/%23ubuntu-classroom.html#t00:00|"Finding Helpful Resources"]]</nowiki>

=== Future Goals ===

* I would like to, one day learn Python or another programming language. (Currently I have nearly no time to complete this.)
